scripts.compile.dev.chrome.win: npm run clean.build.chrome.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome.dev.rb && set TARGET=chrome.dev&&webpack --watch
scripts.compile.dev.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome.dev.rb && TARGET='chrome.dev' webpack --watch
scripts.compile.dev.firefox.win: npm run clean.build.firefox.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_firefox.dev.rb && set TARGET=firefox.dev&&webpack --watch
scripts.compile.dev.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_firefox.dev.rb && TARGET='firefox.dev' webpack --watch
scripts.compile.prod.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=prod TARGET=chrome webpack && compass compile -c config_chrome.rb
scripts.compile.prod.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=prod TARGET=firefox webpack && compass compile -c config_firefox.rb
scripts.compile.stage.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome.rb && NODE_ENV=stage TARGET=chrome webpack --watch
scripts.compile.stage.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=stage TARGET=firefox webpack && compass compile -c config_firefox.rb
